name: MyMountain Tycoon
description:
This game was made for the Taira Games Game Jam - January 2018.  It is inspired by the popular game "Getting Over it" (I mean it is the theme for the jam).

In this game, you have to upgrade your Platypus' speed, so he can deliver 250 of his friends up the mountain.  You get 10 in game currency every time a Platypus is delivered. 

In case you do not know, Platypus is a character from a game I made back in June 2017 - it was one of my first games.

Please note:  Though this game is loosely inspired by Getting Over it, the idea is intended to be original.
